Moves an Agent in a specified direction.

==Syntax==

: <code>move <direction: string></code>

==Arguments==

<code>direction: string</code>
: Specifies the direction of where the Agent is to move.
: Must be one of:
:* <code>forward</code> to move the Agent forward.
:* <code>back</code> to move the Agent backward.
:* <code>left</code> to move the Agent leftward.
:* <code>right</code> to move the Agent rightward.
:* <code>up</code> to move the Agent upward.
:* <code>down</code> to move the Agent downward.

==Result==

Fails if the specified direction is blocked by a block.

On success, the Agent is moved in the direction specified by one block.
